articles.description: Watch, follow and listen to action from Sunday's seven games in the third Round of the FA Cup.
articles.title: FA Cup LIVE: Seven games including Tamworth v Tottenham, Arsenal v Man Utd, Newcastle United v Bromley, Southampton v Swansea City - watch, follow & listen

articles.description: Follow live text commentary and score up dates as Toulon face Harlequins and Bristol welcome Benetton in the Champions Cup.
articles.title: European Champions Cup LIVE: Toulon v Harlequins, Bristol v Benetton, Bath v Clermont - radio commentary, live text and score updates

articles.description: Tottenham come close to FA Cup embarrassment at National League Tamworth before scraping into the fourth round after extra time.
articles.title: Tamworth 0-3 Tottenham: Spurs need extra time to scramble past non-leaguers

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka opens her Australian Open title defence with a straight-set victory over American Sloane Stephens.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka begins title defence with victory over Sloane Stephens

articles.description: Australia show they can win even with a below-par performance, sending England an early warning in the opening match of the Women's Ashes.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: England dealt early warning as Australia show 'no room for weakness'

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text updates from Sunday's two Scottish Premiership fixtures.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Aberdeen v Hearts & Rangers v St Johnstone - radio & text, BBC Sport

articles.description: Watch live coverage of Fulham v London City Lionesses, plus follow live text coverage from 13 other games in the fourth round of the Women's FA Cup.
articles.title: Women's FA Cup LIVE: Watch Fulham v London City Lionesses in fourth-round action, plus radio & live text from 13 other games

articles.description: The Houston Texans' defence stuns the Los Angeles Chargers 32-12 to progress to week two of the NFL play-offs.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Houston Texans beat Los Angeles Chargers on Wildcard Weekend

articles.description: German second seed Alexander Zverev comfortably beats French wildcard Lucas Pouille in the Australian Open first round.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Alexander Zverev cruises into second round

articles.description: Harlequins' hopes of making the Champions Cup knockout stage are dealt a blow as Toulon power to a 33-21 victory at Stade Mayol.
articles.title: Toulon 33-21 Harlequins: Quins fall to Champions Cup defeat in France
